com.lzw.library.transform.widgets

类 FlowLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • com.lzw.library.transform.widgets.FlowLayout
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class FlowLayout
extends android.view.ViewGroup
    流式布局 可多选，可单选，可记住选择状态，状态切换有过渡动画 这个类来源于 https://github.com/jackuhan/FlowlayoutTags 在源码基础上做了少部分调整

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      (专用程序包) class  FlowLayout.InternalTagClickListener
      The tag view click listener for internal use.
      static class  FlowLayout.LayoutParams 
      static interface  FlowLayout.OnTagChangeListener
      当tag改变的时候的监听接口
      static interface  FlowLayout.OnTagClickListener
      当tag被点击的时候的监听接口
      (专用程序包) static class  FlowLayout.SavedState 
      (专用程序包) class  FlowLayout.TagView
      The tag view which has two states can be either NORMAL or INPUT.

      Return the last NORMAL state tag view in this group.

      Returns the tag view at the specified position in the group.

      • getLastTagView

        protected FlowLayout.TagView getLastTagView()
        Return the last NORMAL state tag view in this group.
        返回:
        the last NORMAL state tag view or null if not exists

      • getTags

        public java.lang.String[] getTags()
        Returns the tag array in group, except the INPUT tag.
        返回:
        the tag array.

      • setTags

        public void setTags(java.util.List<java.lang.String> tagList)
        另请参阅:
        setTags(String...)

      • setTags

        public void setTags(java.lang.String... tags)
        Set the tags. It will remove all previous tags first.
        参数:
        tags - the tag list to set.

      • getTagAt

        protected FlowLayout.TagView getTagAt(int index)
        Returns the tag view at the specified position in the group.
        参数:
        index - the position at which to get the tag view from.
        返回:
        the tag view at the specified position or null if the position does not exists within this group.

      • getCheckedTagView

        protected FlowLayout.TagView getCheckedTagView()
        Returns the checked tag view in the group.单选时候有用,多选时候返回第一个
        返回:
        the checked tag view or null if not exists.

      • getCheckedTagText

        Returns the checked tag view in the group.单选时候有用,多选时候返回第一个
        返回:
        the checked tag view or null if not exists.
